replies.author: 54AGE
replies.txt_content:
怪物是否破坏方块  /gr mobGriefing F
F是关闭，T是打开

replies.author: 719_Lokii
replies.txt_content:
Forever.Tower 发表于 2014-2-23 11:56
8级的都不知道~!!
噗，LZ前面是不可以破坏方块的指令
是个人都知道········
commandBlockOutput
doFireTick
doMobLoot
doMobSpawning
doTileDrops
keepInventory
mobGriefing
naturalRegeneration
doDaylightCycle
没那个禁止玩家破坏的
就只有冒险了
